DOC.brief_summary: The study was done to elucidate relationships between midlife women's self-reported hot flashes, neuropsychological symptoms, cognitive performance or sleep.
DOC.brief_title: Soy Isoflavone Tablets: Effects on Sleep, Quality of Life, Symptoms and Cognitive Function in Menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: At least 5 hot flash episodes and/or night sweats per 24 hours Body mass index (BMI) more than 34 kg/m2 Hypertension Shift work Psychiatric or medical conditions that would affect outcome measures More than 4 caffeine drinks per day More than 10 cigarettes per day More than than 7 alcohol drinks per week
